image.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'image'
image.name: ./image

image-file-reference.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'image'
image-file-reference.name: ./s7image

alt-image.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'image'
alt-image.name: ./alt

video.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
video.name: ./video

video-file-reference.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
video-file-reference.name: ./s7video

thumbnail.fieldDescription: Fill this field only if type is 'video'
thumbnail.name: ./thumbnail

location.fieldDescription: This field presents the location related to the asset.
location.name: ./location

ticket-price.fieldDescription: Applicable for Only 'Book Ticket' Option (E.g. 1000 SAR)
ticket-price.name: ticketPrice

ticket-price-suffix.fieldDescription: Applicable for Only 'Book Ticket' Option (E.g. / per person)
ticket-price-suffix.name: ticketPriceSuffix

ticket-cta-label.fieldDescription: Applicable for 'Get Ticket' and 'Book Ticket' options
ticket-cta-label.name: ticketCTALabel

ticket-cta-link.fieldDescription: Applicable for 'Get Ticket' and 'Book Ticket' options
ticket-cta-link.name: ticketCTALink
